Package beans.link

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.link.Link
  • public class Link
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that describes the link object. Encapsulates the full value of the HTML link, the depth relative to the base link, the type of protocol for connecting to the site and the root domain of the site.
    Author:
    Verbitsky Sergey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String baseDomain
      Stores base domain name of the site example: for URL address: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents domain name: en.wikipedia.org
      private int linkDepth
      Stores the depth of link
      private java.lang.String linkValue
      Stores URL address of site
      private java.lang.String protocolValue
      Stores the protocol type of the site (https)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Link

        public Link​(java.lang.String protocolHTTP,
            java.lang.String baseDomain,
            java.lang.String linkValue,
            int currentDepth)
        Constructs the object, and sets values:
        Parameters:
        protocolHTTP - - base HTTP protocol
        baseDomain - - base domain name
        linkValue - - full URL address
        currentDepth - - link depth. Link depth is the number of clicks required to reach a given page from the home page
